tool_description: Get the postal code details of 94 countries with state, latitude and longitude, distance between two areas and more details. There are more than 4 million zip codes from 94 countries covered with this API.
name: Global Zip codes with Lat and Lng
title: Global Zip codes with Lat and Lng
tool_name: Global Zip codes with Lat and Lng

api_list.name: Get Country Details
api_list.description: Get the full details of a country by its country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/country/IN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/country/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Distance between two lat and lng
api_list.description: Given the two latitude and longitude of two places, it will return the distance between the two points

api_list.name: Countries with Postal Codes
api_list.description: This will return the array of country codes which postal codes are available in this api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/country/with-postalcodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-zip-codes-with-lat-and-lng.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Distance between Two Zip Codes
api_list.description: Given two valid zip codes of two places, it will return the distance between them

api_list.name: Get Nearby Places
api_list.description: Given a zip code search a nearby places around a radius

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The zip code to search nearby values

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The current page to load the results.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Optional value to search within the radius. The default is 5.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance. Default is **mi**. The other values are **m** and **km**.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The limited number of results per page. The default is 25

api_list.name: Get Nearby Places by Lat and Lng
api_list.description: Get the nearby places around the given latitude and longitude within a radius

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of the distance. Either mi, m or km. Default is mi

api_list.name: Get details of a Geocode
api_list.description: Get the full details of a Geocode

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The zip code of the place

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Optional country code to search the given zip code

optional_parameters.name: place_name
optional_parameters.description: The optional name of the place to search.

api_list.name: Validate Geocode
api_list.description: Validate a geocode and return true if valid with the zip code details.
